experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: I developed and deployed Java Spring Boot-based REST APIs, enhancing secure communication between applications and reducing latency by 15%. I also optimized data integration with validation checks and SQL query enhancements, improving retrieval speed by 30%. I configured NFS storage and SFTP protocols for secure file handling. I also designed and built ReactJS applications with OAuth 2.0 security, enhancing UI/UX and user authentication. I led the migration of Single Page Applications (SPAs) from OpenShift (OCP3) to AWS S3, reducing costs by 20% and boosting performance by 30%. Additionally, I integrated Kibana and Splunk for real-time log analysis, which reduced troubleshooting time by 40%. I ensured system reliability by achieving 90%+ code coverage through unit and integration tests.

experience.title: Business Intelligence Developer Intern
experience.company: Equinox IT Solutions, LLC, Dallas, TX
experience.description: I implemented business intelligence solutions using Power BI and SQL, developing 30+ interactive dashboards and ad hoc reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs). I enhanced data integrity by performing de-duplication, data cleaning, and compliance checks, ensuring accuracy in financial and operational data. Additionally, I collaborated with data architects to optimize analytics, leading to more data-driven business decisions.

experience.title: Analyst Intern
experience.company: Sarah Cannon Research Institute, Nashville, TN
experience.description: I provided technical support, resolving 95% of hardware and software issues on the first attempt while managing 50% of ServiceNow tickets. I optimized software deployment using SCCM, reducing installation time by 30%. Additionally, I developed standardized desktop images, cutting onboarding time by 40% and ensuring a seamless IT setup for new hires.
